rundown: 6-5 W @ St. Louis Cardinals Grant Holmes: 3.0 innings, 5 earned runs, 9 hits, 0 HR, 1 strikeouts Batters: Sean Murphy (3 hits - 4 AB, 2 HR, 3 RBI) Ronald Acuña Jr. (3 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) Drake Baldwin (2 hits - 3 AB, 0 HR, 1 RBI) The Braves secured a narrow victory against the Cardinals, showcasing a strong offensive performance that ultimately outpaced their pitching struggles. Key highlights include Sean Murphy's standout game with two home runs and three RBIs, contributing significantly to the team's run total. Ronald Acuña Jr. also had a solid outing with three hits, adding to the offensive pressure. Despite Grant Holmes allowing five earned runs, the Braves' bats were able to rally and secure the win.
